intro:
Get ready for a powered-up fishing trip to the vast ocean!
With stunning scenery and a wide variety of fish, the fishing is more thrilling and content-packed than ever!
description:
Let's go fishing on the Nintendo Switch™!
Travel to 4 unique fishing spots—including a rocky coast, seawall, fishing boat, and tropical pier—where the fish you encounter change depending on the location and time of day!
Share Joy-Con™, and up to 4 players can join in!
Aim for a new high score!

[Score Attack]
Catch as many fish as you can within the time limit!
Look out for big fish to boost your score!
Look for the best lure and rod combo for each location!

[Endless]
Sit back, relax, and enjoy endless fishing!
Watch the scenery shift from day to night!
Change your gear when the situation calls and keep an eye out for big fish!

[Ranking]
Compete against players around the world in Score Attack and Endless modes!
Show off your skills by increasing your high score and rank!

[Battle]
Face off against CPUs in single-player mode, or test your skills against friends in multiplayer battles!

[Shop]
Spend the points you've earned from fishing to buy new lures and rods!
Find your favorite lure/rod combination!

[Records]
Every fish you catch will be recorded in your personal encyclopedia!
Can you reel in every species and complete the collection?
